title: Playgirl: Hitting the G Spot
overview: Playgirl presents "Hitting The G Spot," starring Alexis Malone, Kylie Ireland, Mia Smiles, Nicole Sheridan, Pason, Penny Flame, and Tyler Faith. Since its discovery, the G spot has played hard to get. But we have a group of fellas who are willing to try and tackle the G Spots of several very sexy and horny ladies. Join us as we go deep in search of the erogenous zones. Tonight we're Hitting the G Spot.
